db:section.db:title: Synopsis
db:section.db:para: If versionless commands are disabled, use qt6_wrap_ui() instead. It supports the same set of arguments as this command.

db:section.db:title: Description
db:section.db:para: Creates rules for calling the User Interface Compiler (uic) on the given .ui files. For each input file, an header file is generated in the build directory. The paths of the generated header files are added to <VAR>.

db:note.db:para: This is a low-level macro. See the CMake AUTOUIC Documentation for a more convenient way to process .ui files with uic.

db:section.db:title: Options
db:section.db:para: You can set additional OPTIONS that should be added to the uic calls. You can find possible options in the uic documentation.

db:section.db:title: Examples
db:section.db:programlisting: set(SOURCES mainwindow.cpp main.cpp) qt_wrap_ui(SOURCES mainwindow.ui) qt_add_executable(myapp ${SOURCES})
